mapper.sql: f_id, f_academy_id, f_number, f_name, f_password, f_is_delete, f_creator_id, f_createtime, f_updater_id, f_updatetime
mapper.select:
select
from t_teacher te where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and f_is_delete = 0

select te.f_id,te.f_academy_id ,te.f_number,te.f_name,te.f_password,a.f_name as a_name from t_teacher te left join t_academy a on te.f_academy_id = a.f_id where te.f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and te.f_is_delete = false
mapper.delete: delete from t_teacher where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and f_is_delete = false
mapper.insert: insert into t_teacher (f_id, f_academy_id, f_number, f_name, f_password, f_is_delete, f_creator_id, f_createtime, f_updater_id, f_updatetime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{academyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_teacher
f_academy_id = #{academyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
f_creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_updater_id = #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_teacher set f_academy_id = #{academyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, f_creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_updater_id = #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select te.f_id,te.f_academy_id ,te.f_number,te.f_name,te.f_password,a.f_name as a_name from t_teacher te left join t_academy a on te.f_academy_id = a.f_id where te.f_is_delete = 0

select
from t_teacher where f_number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and f_is_delete = 0
select count(*) from t_teacher where f_is_delete = 0 and f_academy_id = #{academyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_teacher (f_id, f_academy_id, f_number, f_name, f_password, f_is_delete, f_creator_id, f_createtime, f_updater_id, f_updatetime) values
(#{teacher.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teacher.academyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teacher.number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacher.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacher.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacher.isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{teacher.creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teacher.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{teacher.updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teacher.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
